LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedBoltActionRifle.label: rusted rifle
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedBoltActionRifle.descriptio:
A piece of bioferrite shaped like a bolt-action rifle.
Somehow can shoot if wielded by rusted creature.
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedRevolver.label: rusted revolver
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedRevolver.description:
A piece of bioferrite shaped like a revolver.
Somehow can shoot if wielded by rusted creature.
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedRevolver.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedShotgun.label: rusted shotgun
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedShotgun.description:
A piece of bioferrite shaped like a shotgun.
Somehow can shoot if wielded by rusted creature.
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedSMG.label: rusted SMG

A piece of bioferrite shaped like a sub-machine gun.
Somehow can shoot if wielded by rusted creature.
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedSMG.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedSMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.NAT_Gun_RustedSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: rusted SMG
LanguageData.NAT_MeleeWeapon_RustedArmyBanner.label: rusted army banner
LanguageData.NAT_MeleeWeapon_RustedArmyBanner.descrip: A piece of ancient fabric on a rusted bioferrite rod.
LanguageData.NAT_MeleeWeapon_RustedAxe.label: rusted axe
LanguageData.NAT_MeleeWeapon_RustedAxe.description: A sharp bioferrite piece shaped like an axe.
LanguageData.NAT_MeleeWeapon_RustedSword.label: rusted sword
LanguageData.NAT_MeleeWeapon_RustedSword.description: A sharp bioferrite piece shaped like a sword.
LanguageData.NAT_Proj_RustedGrenade.label: rusted grenade
LanguageData.NAT_Weapon_RustedGrenade.label: rusted grenades
LanguageData.NAT_Weapon_RustedGrenade.description:
A pieces of bioferrite shaped like grenades.
Somehow can explode if were thrown by rusted creature.
